examples.example: 经过一番努力，他终于实现了自己的梦想。

translate.english: After a lot of efforts, he finally realized his dream.

examples.example: 他经过一番精心准备，出色地完成了这次演讲。

translate.english: After some careful preparations, he accomplished this speech excellently.

examples.example: 经过一番拼搏，他收获了满满的成功与喜悦。

translate.english: After a lot of hard work, he reaped full success and joy.
